formalText: what she feels is mostly kind of sad.
She is relieved to be feeling better.
she is not sure how much better she does feel but certainly better enough to be out of the hospital.
Her mind is kind of just blank.
She doesn't seem to have that many kind of much annoying side effects.
It's not like the most okay ever, but she thinks she is okay.
I guess I just feel like I should just be able to let go of the anxiety.
